name: Fritzner Obin
bio: Fritzner Obin was born in 1967 in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. He is the father of two daughters and a son. Originally inspired by the artist Voltaire Hector, he has been painting since the mid-1990's. His paintings usually depict Haitian daily life or vodou scenes. His work can be described as creative, whimsical, humorous, and impulsive.
In addition to being a painter, Fritzner Obin writes for a local newspaper, and is involved with the radio production 'Radio Magic in Magic.'

artworks.title: Pandan Manbo Marie
description: Pandan Manbo Marie was one of 25 Haitian paintings from this collection that were exhibited in the show Life in Bold Colors at Sonoma State University, Sonoma, California in 2007.
